name: Night Watch (itch) (thewurstgames23)
description:
My submission for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2

You have the security night shift for the new museum in town, but suddenly criminals appear, and are after the few exhibits you have!

Luckily, you have one defense against them, your impeccable hearing!

Chase down and capture criminals for as long as you can!

Credit for the art assets from @gif_not_jif , I used the Super Retro World Interior pack for the walls and floors. Also, credit to https://arongranberg.com/ for the A* pathfinding project.
